name: Iron Heavy Blade
description: A substantial iron blade component designed for crafting large slashing weapons such as longswords, greataxes, battleaxes, and greatswords. This reliable component provides solid cutting power at an affordable cost.
properties: Standard material damage with no special effects

name: Steel Heavy Blade
description: A substantial steel blade component designed for crafting large slashing weapons such as longswords, greataxes, battleaxes, and greatswords. This durable component offers improved performance over iron alternatives.
properties: Standard material damage with no special effects

name: True Steel Heavy Blade
description: A substantial true steel blade component designed for crafting large slashing weapons of exceptional quality. This masterwork component delivers superior cutting power through advanced metallurgy.
properties: Adds +1 primary damage when fabricated into an item.

name: Starsteel Heavy Blade
description: A substantial starsteel blade component forged from legendary celestial metal. This otherworldly component channels devastating power through its otherworldly properties.
properties: Adds +2 primary damage and +1 secondary damage when fabricated into an item.
